message: I have a special case in that I want the subrequests in the batch to be processed in parallel, but to re-join them all (using your AsyncBarrier class) before calling an external system. Due to that there's no async I/O in the initial subrequest handling so they each run sequentially until they hit the barrier. To force that initial stage to run in parallel I'm now using HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem with a TaskCompetionSource in the Task.WhenAll.
